synopsis.text: When a swarm of wasps decimates his home and separates him from his queen mother, Hutch, a young honeybee, embarks on a perilous journey to find her. Raised by a bumblebee family after being found as the sole surviving egg, Hutch faces rejection from his adoptive siblings. Despite the adversity, he remains resilient, helping others and even saving one of his siblings from a menacing grasshopper. Upon discovering his true identity as a honeybee, Hutch sets out on a quest to find his real mother, encountering various insects along the way. As he navigates the challenges of the insect world, Hutch grows into a brave and strong bee, leaving a lasting impact on those he meets, even as many of them face untimely ends.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
